tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Through this post I am just sharing my experience with TOSH hospital, Kilpauk. For my nagging right shoulder pain for the past 1 year and (after exhausting all conservative and other treatments)  I decided to undergo Arthroscopy surgery by Dr Jaheer Hussain. 
 He meticulously and patiently went  through my reports, MRI etc and explained in detail what exactly my problem is and how he is going to perform the surgery through  his video presentation and how the problems are going to be fixed. I underwent surgery 6 weeks back and from day one I was confident that I was under safe hands. After succeesful surgery now I am in stage 3 of physio therapy,  sling removed and there is remarkable recovery. There was no problem  at all in the shoulder excepting very minor pain which i managed without pain killers . I should express my gratitude to Dr and his assistant
 Dr Prabhu and the friendly  reception team . I should thank the Almighty for taking me to this hospital.

My father K Ramesh Babu had Knee Laproscopy surgery in Jan, 2020. We are from Hyderabad and traveled Chennai to undergo this procedure. 

As opposed to all our fears, the hospital, hospital staff and "Dr Jaheer Hussain"(special thanks to him) provided utmost care and has been supportive throughout the process. Team was impressive, particularly Dr Prabhu Manikyam guided me before and after surgery. The procedure was exactly the way it was explained to us. The facilities provided at the hospital was very good. Post operative care, physiotherapy, and post operative recovery is very satisfactory.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My knee slipped while playing shuttle , insisted by my uncle consulted DR Jaheer Hussian who suggested an MRI after examining my knee , the tests stated an complete Acl tear & Grade 3 medial meniscal tear.
In September underwent a keyhole surgery, the hospital staff & administration took great care and were very cordial.
After 3 months review with the Doctor at present my legs are normal as before the injury.
The Doctor is kind, clears your doubts gives good suggestions and overall good treatment. I strongly recommend.

doctor's very warm n caring as is the entire staff. full co operation by them . Dr jaheer makes sure the patient is every bit comfortable only then does he go ahead with the procedure, no coersion whatsoever, he is very polite n explains all our queries and doubts vividly.

I went for my son hand fracture treatment, ***** * ******* ** ** **** *** *********** ****** *** ** ******** *** ****** ** ***** **** **** *** **** **** ***** ** ***** ******** *** ** ****** I went on 2nd week with the X-ray after seeing the X-ray he didn't do anything. When I went on 3rd Week with X-ray ** **** *** ******* *** he sent that X-ray photo to other doctor *** ***** *** ************ **** **** * ***** ** ***** **** ********* I did very big mistake by going to him for treatment. ******* ** *** **** ********* ** *** **** **** ********* *** ******** Till now Iam crying by seeing my child hand. ****** ******* **** *** *** **** ** *** *****

I. have consulted many hospitals I found this hospital ***** ***** service is good . I have done total knee replacement for both my knees . I feel very satisfied. now I don't have knee pain .I will refer this hospital to my known people. doctor is very good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Both my parents tested positive, Mr Hussain was so patient and calm in explaining everything and was so helpful. Would higher recommend people to  Tosh and especially to Mr. Hussain

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Dr Jaheer Hussein is kindness personified.
At the same time, he explained pros and cons of surgical procedures so that we could weigh various options and come to a decision.

Very sensitive and considerate. Leaves final decisions to patients. Having been with the doctor and hospital for long ,I would definitely attest the quality of experience at the hospital and the associated treatment
Very good satisfaction about this new Bone Marrow treatment my wife done this procedure its good result
